modName: FR and ENG - Mandalorian Shield of Setvi - Skyrim
summary:
This mod add a standalone knightly Mandalorian Shield, with a Mandalorian symbol.
This mod come in .BSA version ; in French and English.

For the stats, please look at the pictures.
Craft: at forge under steel section.

Thanks to Abakus and thanks to you.
Sorry for the ugly Mandalorian symbol.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#d9d2e9][b][size=4]This mod add a standalone knightly Mandalorian Shield, with a Mandalorian symbol.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]This mod come in .BSA version ; in French and English.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]
[/size][/b][b][size=4]For the stats, please look at the pictures.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]Craft: at forge under steel section.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]
[/size][/b][b][size=4]Thanks to Abakus and thanks to you.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]Sorry for the ugly Mandalorian symbol.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]
[/size][/b][b][size=4]No DLC or no other mods are required.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]I used the modders ressource I've found here:
[/size][/b][b][size=4]
[/size][/b][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5916/?]A Steel Heater Shield by Abakus
[/url][/size][/b][b][size=4]
[/size][/b][b][size=4]I'm not sure but this mod - maybe - doesn't work with any other mod who use the HeaterShield.esp or .dds textures - not tested atm.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]Since I start in a new job, I've no time to mod/update/play at Skyrim.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]
[/size][/b][b][size=4]No copyright infringement intended.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]Sorry for my bad English.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]____________[/size][/b][b][size=4]
Thanks, Setvi.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]
[/size][/b][b][size=4]My others mods:
[/size][/b][b][size=4]
[/size][/b][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2764642/?tb=mods&pUp=1]SETVI's account User Files.
[/url][/size][/b][b][size=4]
[/size][/b][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url]
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/67990-2-1444644960.png[/img]
[youtube]Q3YcCLaTnBE[/youtube]
[img]http://orig13.deviantart.net/9904/f/2012/050/c/f/mandalorian_shoulder_symbol_by_chupacabrathing-d4qbt2k.png[/img]
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/72085-0-1450735963.jpg[/img][/size][/b]
[/color][/center]
author: Setvi
